mapper.insert:
insert into api_av_gameinfo
tid,
transType,
amount,
transType2,
amount2,
provider,
roundID,
gameInfo,
history,
isRoundFinished,
time,
userID,
createtime,
Platformflag
#{tid},
#{transType},
#{amount},
#{transType2},
#{amount2},
#{provider},
#{roundID},
#{gameInfo},
#{history},
#{isRoundFinished},
#{time},
#{userID},
#{createtime},
#{Platformflag}
mapper.update:
update api_av_gameinfo
transType=#{transType},
amount=#{amount},
transType2=#{transType2},
amount2=#{amount2},
provider=#{provider},
roundID=#{roundID},
gameInfo=#{gameInfo},
history=#{history},
isRoundFinished=#{isRoundFinished},
time=#{time},
userID=#{userID},
createtime=#{createtime},
Platformflag=#{Platformflag}
where tid=#{tid}
mapper.select: select * from api_av_gameinfo a where a.tid=#{key}

select * from api_av_gameinfo a
a.tid like '%${tid}%'
and a.transType like '%${transType}%'
and a.amount=#{amount}
and a.transType2 like '%${transType2}%'
and a.amount2=#{amount2}
and a.provider like '%${provider}%'
and a.roundID like '%${roundID}%'
and a.gameInfo like '%${gameInfo}%'
and a.history like '%${history}%'
and a.isRoundFinished like '%${isRoundFinished}%'
and a.time between #{BEGIN_DATE} and #{END_DATE}
and a.userID like '%${userID}%'
and a.createtime between #{BEGIN_DATE} and #{END_DATE}
and a.Platformflag like '%${Platformflag}%'
order by a.${order}
order by a.tid asc

select count(*) as total from api_av_gameinfo a
a.tid like '%${tid}%'
and a.transType like '%${transType}%'
and a.amount=#{amount}
and a.transType2 like '%${transType2}%'
and a.amount2=#{amount2}
and a.provider like '%${provider}%'
and a.roundID like '%${roundID}%'
and a.gameInfo like '%${gameInfo}%'
and a.history like '%${history}%'
and a.isRoundFinished like '%${isRoundFinished}%'
and a.time between #{BEGIN_DATE} and #{END_DATE}
and a.userID like '%${userID}%'
and a.createtime between #{BEGIN_DATE} and #{END_DATE}
and a.Platformflag like '%${Platformflag}%'

select COALESCE(sum(${COLUMN}),0) from api_av_gameinfo a
a.tid like '%${tid}%'
and a.transType like '%${transType}%'
and a.amount=#{amount}
and a.transType2 like '%${transType2}%'
and a.amount2=#{amount2}
and a.provider like '%${provider}%'
and a.roundID like '%${roundID}%'
and a.gameInfo like '%${gameInfo}%'
and a.history like '%${history}%'
and a.isRoundFinished like '%${isRoundFinished}%'
and a.time between #{BEGIN_DATE} and #{END_DATE}
and a.userID like '%${userID}%'
and a.createtime between #{BEGIN_DATE} and #{END_DATE}
and a.Platformflag like '%${Platformflag}%'
